attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Jet Sword
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
